## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Thomas Brinson
**판결일**: 1995-06-09
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 216 A.D.2d 901
- 629 N.Y.S.2d 688

## 판결문 요약


Judgment unanimously modified on the law and as modified affirmed in accordance with same Memorandum as in People v Brinson (216 AD2d 900 [decided herewith]). (Appeal from Judgment of Ontario County Court, Henry, Jr., J.—Kidnapping, 2nd Degree.) Present—Pine, J. P., Lawton, Wesley, Callahan and Boehm, JJ.
